name: Garden Pop -Crush the charm toy & scapes shooter
name_original: Garden Pop -Crush the charm toy & scapes shooter
description:
Garden Pop is a magic match 3 puzzle game with delicious fruits over hundreds of addictive levels. You will experience the adventure with Garden Pop in Kingdoms of lively Banana, Hot Pepper, Pear, Cherry and other delicious fruit. Swap fruits to clear your way and dig into your own adventures.

Garden Pop MAIN FEATURES:

●Create Crazy BOMBS by matching four or more fruits and blast the Garden!
●Beautiful and Brilliant Graphics.
●Unwrap delicious environments and meet the beautiful backgrounds.
●Match Fruit and collect all kinds of elements, not only Fruits to win the level before you run out of moves.
●Match 4 or more fruits to create Sweet and big combos and blast your way to victory.
●Fun and easy to play, but Challenging to fully master. Can you score 3 stars on every level?
●Daily events! Collect daily free coins of rewards.
●Marvelous game modes include:
Honeycomb– Match fruits on the honeycomb to collect the sweet honeycomb
Wooden Box – Match fruits next to the box to break the box and expand your beautiful Fruit Garden
Green Lawn – Drop fruit into the green lawn to clean the dirty fruits
Fruit Basket – Match Fruits next to the Fruit Basket to release the trapped delicious fruits
Flower – Feed the flower pot with fruits to bloom the fragrant flowers

Download the Garden Pop now and enjoy your beautiful and amazing adventure!
developers: Bubble Go Ltd: Casual games for girls
publishers: Shanghai New Dragon Restaurant Management Co
